member.name: IPropertyChangeArray.Append
member.summary: Inserts a change operation at the end of an array.
member.param: A pointer to the interface that contains the change.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IPropertyChangeArray.AppendOrReplace
member.summary: Replaces the first occurrence of a change that affects the same property key as the provided change. If the property key is not already in the array, this method appends the change to the end of the array.
member.param: A pointer to the interface that contains the change
member.returns: Returns S_OK if successful, or an error value otherwise.

member.name: IPropertyChangeArray.GetAt
member.summary: Gets the change operation at a specified array index.
member.param: The index of the change to retrieve.
A reference to the desired IID.
The address of a pointer to the interface specified by riid, usually .
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IPropertyChangeArray.GetCount
member.summary: Gets the number of change operations in the array.
member.param: A pointer to the number of change operations.

member.name: IPropertyChangeArray.InsertAt
member.summary: Inserts a change operation into an array at the specified position.
member.param: The index at which the change is inserted.
A pointer to the interface that contains the change.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IPropertyChangeArray.IsKeyInArray
member.summary: Specifies whether a particular property key exists in the change array.
member.param: A reference to the structure of interest.
member.returns: Returns S_OK if key is found; otherwise, E_FAIL.

member.name: IPropertyChangeArray.RemoveAt
member.param: The index of the change to remove.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IPropertyChangeArray
member.summary: Exposes methods for several multiple change operations that may be passed to .
